description: System health monitoring, observability, and alerting for LUKHAS platform
purpose: Provides comprehensive system monitoring, observability infrastructure, and intelligent alerting for detecting anomalies and performance issues

capabilities.name: monitoring
capabilities.description: Monitor system health metrics, performance indicators, and operational status

capabilities.name: observability
capabilities.description: Provide system observability through traces, metrics, and logs

capabilities.name: alerting
capabilities.description: Generate intelligent alerts for anomalies, thresholds, and critical events

quality_guarantees.input_validation: All metrics and alerts validated for format and ranges
quality_guarantees.error_handling: Monitoring failures do not impact monitored systems
quality_guarantees.type_safety: Full type annotations for all monitoring APIs
quality_guarantees.idempotency: Alert generation is idempotent within time windows

security.network_description: Sends metrics to Prometheus, traces to OTLP collectors
